10

Boston snowfall expected

Saturday's storm won't be memorable for wind, or snow amounts, but it will break the streak of bare ground in place since the beginning of 2012. (Boston.com, 4 p.m.)
  • Forecasters: Boston could get 4 inches of snow on Sat.
  • Watch WBZ weather forecast | Extended forecast
  • Storm Center | N.E. ski & snow sports guide

Massachusetts medical device makers: January 1 tax could cost jobs

Stalled fiscal cliff negotiations have medical device companies in Massachusetts warning of potential job losses if a 2.3 percent excise tax is implemented. (AP)
  • Obama 'optimistic' on fiscal cliff deal
  • What fiscal cliff means for you  |  What it would cost Mass.

Man dies in Peddocks Island in Boston Harbor; investigation underway

Authorities are investigating the death of a man on Peddocks Island, according to the Boston Fire Department's official Twitter page. (Boston Globe)

Ways to celebrate New Year's in Boston

Indian rape victim dies in hospital

A young Indian woman who was gang-raped and severely beaten on a bus in New Delhi died Saturday at a Singapore hospital. (AP, 5:36 p.m.)
